Here, we provide a table of results for all the articles included in the systematic review. Similarly, we provide a table of studies that were excluded from analysis with exclusion reasons. We embeded a search function that allows multiple keyword search by placing a “ “ in between keywords, a custom search builder that allows multiple conditional search, and an export tool that allows copying and downloading data in csv format. Moreover, clicking the “green +” button allows you to view all the extracted and computed information of the article. For a key of exclusion reasons, see Key.
